name: Sruthi Machina
about_me: I am an enthusiastic and dedicated student who is keen to tackle any challenge thrown at me. It fascinates me that Politics concentrates on government decisions, while Economics focuses on the execution and ramifications of these; I wish to pursue any opportunities that will allow me to engage in real-world applications of this interchange.
